name: footer?:Snippet<[any,any]>
description: Snippet for create a custom footer for alert.

name: onClose?:(value: string | undefined | boolean) => void;
description: close function that triggers when alert is closed.

name: promptProps?:InputProps
description: Properties for input component on prompt alert type.

name: animationFunction?:SvelteTransitionFn
description: Function for svelte transition animtation on render component.

name: animationParams?:{delay?:number,duration?:number,easing:EaseFn,...any}
description: Parameters for the animation function. Controls duration of the animation, delay, easing, etc. Easing function must be a svelte easing function a like.
